author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1018: Using runAtClient (XmlHttpRequest) for expanding a tree doesn't work when a node label contains a <script> tag.
Modified the netui-tree.js JavaScript to handle the issue with the innerHTML assignment in Mozilla and added a test (best run manually with Mozilla or Firefox).
